alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 25 at 12:55PM PDT until September 25 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SURPRISE VALLEY, EASTERN LASSEN COUNTY, AND NORTHERN WASHOE COUNTY... * CHANGES... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 270 Surprise Valley California, Fire Weather Zone 278 Eastern Lassen County and Fire Weather Zone 458 Northern Washoe County. * Winds...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph. * Humidity...10 to 20 percent. * Duration...3 to 7 hours. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first responders can contain them.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor activities that can cause a spark near dry vegetation, such as yard work, target shooting, or campfires. Follow local fire restrictions. Check weather.gov/reno for updates and livingwithfire.info for preparedness tips.
